message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. It's a unique opportunity and I believe it's priced fairly considering its value.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of your product, but I am only able to commit up to $1800000 at this time. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, $1800000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1900000. This would still be a great deal for you considering the unique value of this product. Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I am comfortable with a price of $1750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  $1750000 is still a little lower than where I need to be.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1850000. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
I've carefully considered our previous discussions, Alice. I believe a fair price for the product would be $1800000. I hope this proposal will help us reach an agreement.
